subject.normal: [Pro. PHP Dev.] Using or not using PHP framework

headers.subject: [Pro. PHP Dev.] Using or not using PHP framework

body.para: What changes will my web application finally have if I use a cakephp framework rather than not using it? Can I later on change my application without the framework? Does the file types & formats of my application application remain the same whther or not I chose to use framework?
I think the file type does gets changed..normally its .php but with cakephp its something else
